decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The portakabins hereby permitted shall be removed and the land re-instated to its former condition as grassland on or before 1 September 2018.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (HD/9254/02; HD/7960/08; Transport Assessment; Noise Assessment; Arboricultural Impact Assessment; Planning Statement; Phase 1 Preliminary Risk Assessment and Phase 2 Environmental and Geotechnical Site Investigation Report; Preliminary Ecological Appraisal; Historic Environment Desk Based Assessment; Transport Assessment; Flood Risk Assessment; Design and Access Statement; Received: 03/05/2016; 11677/16-T301 Rev P1; Travel Plan; Technical Note; Received 22/06/2016; TSS027 rev 10 Received 13/07/2016.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Prior to the construction of temporary buildings, Tree Protection Plan within the submitted Arboricultural Impact Assessment shall be implemented on the ground and retained during the construction.

Condition : 4 - Within 3 months of first occupation, a revised School Travel Plan that includes the travel survey results and updated mitigation measures and action plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - Within the 3 months of this decision, school keep clear markings along the Vicarage Farm Road shall be procured.

Condition : 6 - Within 3 months of this decision there should be at least 19 covered and secure non vertical or semi-vertical cycle parking spaces for pupils and 3 cycle parking spaces for staff to be provided.
description: Installation of modular buildings to be used as temporary classroom accommodation
